title: So let's talk Ez.
body:
I want the honest thoughts on all his skins, I like them all about the same, but honestly, I don't like pulse fire, it doesn't really seem like it's worth the $30 ... I mean I have it because I wanted it, but after playing it, I don't like it, it needs a rework in my opinion. I find his Arcade Ez one is more of a $30 skin than the actual $30 skin itself. What does the community think?

Posted from deleted thread.

"Dunkin Darius (NA) - 35 minutes ago

It's not as good because it's old, like the older legendary skins that are basically just remodels:

The Magnificent Twisted Fate
Red Baron Corki
Ice Toboggan Corki
Annie in Wonderland

I agree, but I believe it's time for Ez Pulse fire to get an update, Riot actually might lose money (Doubt it) if they don't update him because of the people who are "new" and buying skins, will see "Pulse fire ez" in game and be like "Ew thats an ugly skin" and they might refrain from buying it, unless you're like me and buy it because it's the only skin you're missing from his set.. I hope they can re-model/rework his pulse fire ez skin to make it feel like it's more in todays graphics of League of Legends, that would be amazing!"

replies.body: Well it looks like you answered it yourself tbh. Pulsefire Ezreal was the first of the ultimate skins, and at it's release it was far outclassing other skins beyond it's league, allthough i do believe there needs to be some for of revision for it, but that's about it... it's an OG skin

They're going to update Pulsefire when they update Ezreal.
You'll have to wait for a looooong time.
